== Hide Menu / Bar Option . ==

 {o} A 'Hide' option for menus / bars ( Like Menu-bar , Tool-bar or Status-bar ) will provide more area to work with .

=== Proposals ===

 {o} Menu Hide Modes -
1. Manual Key press- A user defined and configurable Key or Key combination to hide & unhide .

2. Manual Mouse - On middle mouse button click ( or right = Left click - customizable )on title bar . Or integrated with a mouse gesture program

3. 1 + 2

4. Automatic - Self explanatory . Unhide methods -same as in 1 , 2 , or 3 .

5. None

6. Titlebar + Menubar - in a single Bar , As in chrome browser <<BR>>

    [Same for all Bars ]
